titleText.zdocTitle: Yuk, Foto KTP Anda untuk verif

subTitleText.zdocScanTipsDetail: Sesuaikan KTP Anda di dalam frame sampai keempat sisi berubah jadi biru

instructionText.zdocCapture_00620000001: Letakkan KTP Anda di dalam frame dan ambil fotonya
instructionText.zdocConfirm_00620000001: Pastikan KTP kamu terlihat jelas, bebas dari pantulan cahaya, dan tidak buram ya.
instructionText.zdocScanTipsDetail1: Scan the front side of ID
instructionText.zdocScanTipsDetail2: Scan the back side of ID
instructionText.zdocScanTipsTiltedFront: Scan the tilted front side of ID
instructionText.zh5degradeCollectSecondPageChinaID: Verification successful.Please capture ID's national emblem side.
instructionText.zh5degradeCollectSecondPageID: Verification successful. Please capture the back of the ID.
instructionText.zh5degradeCollectSelfieImage: Vertification successful. Please take a selfie image.
instructionText.zfaceScanTipsMoveRight: Turn your head to the right
instructionText.zfaceScanTipsMoveLeft: Turn your head to the left

systemErrorMsg: Sorry, a system error has occured. Please try again later.
networkErrorMsg: Please check your internet connection and try again.
zdocNofaceMsg: The portrait in the document is blurry or incomplete, please take a clear photo.
zdocExposureMsg: Please adjust the lighting to avoid over exposure.
zdocBlurMsg: Please make sure your ID is fully visible, glare-free and not blurry.
zdocImperfectMsg: Please make sure your ID is fully visible, glare-free and not blurry.
zdocWrongDocumentMsg: Make sure you are using the required type of ID.
zdocUnknowMsg: Make sure you are using the required type of ID.
zdocTimeOutMsg: Please make sure your ID is clear and non-reflective
alertText.unsupportDeviceTitle: Browser or device is not supported
unsupportDeviceMsg: The browser or device is not supported, please change the browser or device.
zfaceTimeOutMsg: Please face the camera directly for easy capturing.
zdocNoDocumentMsg: Please align your ID with the frame before taking a photo.
zfaceScanFailMsg: Please face the phone camera directly and ensure that your face is bright and clear.
cameraPermissionMsg: Please allow the application to access your camera, or refresh and try again.
retryMaxMsg: You have reached the maximum number of attempts. Please try again later.
zh5degradeNoCameraPermissionMsg: Please go to settings and enable camera permission before trying again. Or tap "Enter capture mode" to complete the verification.
